com.navis.framework.portal

Class ApiMappings

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.navis.framework.portal.ApiMappings
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    TopmostBeanFactoryAware

    public class ApiMappings
extends java.lang.Object
implements TopmostBeanFactoryAware
    Encapsulates mapping of API name to details about the API.


    In 1.0, ApiMappings now supports multiple source xml files in the same pattern as Metafield Dictionary. Mappings can be defined in files named xxx-api-mappings.xml and registered as loaders with the Roastery. For instance, carina has a framework-api-mappings.xml which is registered in FrameworkBizApplicationContext.xml as below and is automatically included to all modules.

    <bean id="frameworkApiMappingLoader" class="com.navis.framework.portal.ApiMappingLoaderImpl">
  <property name="xmlFilePaths">
      <list>
          <value>META-INF/framework-api-mappings.xml</value>
       </list>
        </property>
    </bean>

    Duplicated mapping names override previous definitions.  Modules which have overridden apiMappings, should rename api-mappings.xml to a unique name (i.e. xxxxx-api-mappings.xml) and add  xxxxApiMappingLoader bean to xxxxBizApplicationContext.xml.   When instantiating apiMappings bean (or running com.navis.framework.portalApiMappingSaTestSuite), you will get an info dump listing all registered mappings.
      

    2004-10-22 13:54:49,730 INFO  [ApiMappings:31] resolveApiMapping: Loading API mapping bean factory
 2004-10-22 13:54:49,745 INFO  [Roastery:25] Loading Test Stream META-INF/framework-api-mappings.xml
 2004-10-22 13:54:49,777 INFO  [Roastery:25] Loading Test Stream META-INF/argo-api-mappings.xml
 2004-10-22 13:54:49,855 INFO  [Roastery:25] Loading Test Stream META-INF/api-mappings.xml
 2004-10-22 13:54:49,886 INFO  [ApiMappings:64] Listing all API mappings from org.springframework.beans.factory.xml.XmlBeanFactory
 defining beans [BASE_QUERY,BASE_UPDATE,DAYS_OF_WEEK_FINDER,validateUserLogin,getEntityScope];
 parent=<org.springframework.beans.factory.xml.XmlBeanFactory defining beans [getEntityScope,validateUserLogin];

    2004-10-22 13:54:49,917 INFO  [ApiMappings:68] Bean #0 : validateUserLogin scopeManager,validateUserLogin
